Trait.Name: Botox Treatment
Trait.Desc: She recently had Botox injected into her face. If she is happy about it, no one can tell.

Trait.Name: Bruises
Trait.Desc: This girl has bruises all over her body.

Trait.Name: Demon Possessed
Trait.Desc: Her body is currently being physically possessed by a demon.

Trait.Name: Emprisoned Customer
Trait.Desc: This girl was was a customer but broke the law in some way, allowing you to take her as a slave.

Trait.Name: Kidnapped
Trait.Desc: This girl was taken from her family.

Trait.Name: Out-Patient Surgery
Trait.Desc: She recently got out of surgery and should be resting.

Trait.Name: Spirit Possessed
Trait.Desc: Her body is currently being physically possessed by an evil spirit.
